article_title: Damon Motorcycles makes acquisition, raises $3M and extends pre-orders
article_description: EV startup Damon Motorcycles has acquired the IP of Mission Motors  raised  3 million in funding and announced a special production run of its debut model  The Vancouver based venture unveiled the 200 mph Hypersport in January and began taking pre orders for
article_content: EV startup Damon Motorcycles has acquired the IP of Mission Motors  raised  3 million in funding and announced a special production run of its debut model The Vancouver based venture unveiled the 200 mph Hypersport in January and began taking pre orders for   5938 chars
